document_title: Precocious puberty: Causes, symptoms, diagnosis and treatment
subsection_content:
Below are some common symptoms when children have early puberty:
Breast development in girls;; Time of first menstruation;; Testicles and penis develop;; Facial hair and beard begin to grow;; Deep, broken voice;; Growth of pubic and armpit hair;; The body grows quickly;; Acne appears;; Starting to have body odor.
